Class ChicagoPizzaController

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizza.ChicagoPizzaController
public class ChicagoPizzaController extends Object
The `ChicagoPizzaController` manages UI interactions for ordering Chicago-style pizzas in the RuPizzeria app. It allows users to select a pizza type, customize toppings, choose size, and manage the order process. The controller interacts with UI elements and uses the ChicagoPizza factory for pizza creation.
Author:
Raashi Maheshwari, Tanvi Yamarthy

  • Method Details

    • setOrder

      public void setOrder(Order order)
      Sets the current order object.
      Parameters:
      order - the current order to be set

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by setting up listeners, pizza types, and available toppings.

    • backToMain

      private void backToMain()
      Navigates back to the main menu scene.

    • loadPizzaToppings

      private void loadPizzaToppings()
      Loads the toppings selected for the pizza into the selected toppings list.

    • updatePizzaSelection

      private void updatePizzaSelection(String pizzaType)
      Updates the pizza selection based on the selected pizza type.
      Parameters:
      pizzaType - the type of pizza selected

    • addTopping

      private void addTopping()
      Adds a selected topping to the pizza if it is allowed (up to a max of 7 toppings).

    • displayImage

      private void displayImage(String pizzaType)
      Displays an image of the selected pizza type.
      Parameters:
      pizzaType - the selected pizza type

    • removeTopping

      private void removeTopping()
      Removes a selected topping from the pizza.

    • addPizzaToOrder

      private void addPizzaToOrder()
      Adds the current pizza to the order if valid selections are made.

    • resetFields

      private void resetFields()
      Resets all the fields and UI elements to their initial state. This includes clearing the pizza type, toppings, crust, price, and resetting the size radio buttons. Also disables the topping buttons and clears the pizza image.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays an informational alert with the specified title and message.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert
      message - the message content of the alert

    • showSuccess

      private void showSuccess(String title, String message)
      Displays a success message in an informational alert with a custom style. The alert is displayed with a green background to indicate a successful operation.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the success alert
      message - the message content to display in the success alert

    • updatePrice

      private void updatePrice()
      Updates the price field based on the selected pizza size and type. The method checks which size (small, medium, or large) is selected and calculates the price accordingly. If the pizza is "Build Your Own", it updates the price based on the selected toppings.
